subject: National Invitation Tournament
organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: Delroy James scored 18 points and Lamonte Ulmer added 13, including a big basket in the final seconds, to lead Rhode Island past host Virginia Tech, 79-72, in the National Invitation Tournament.
snippet: Delroy James scored 18 points and Lamonte Ulmer added 13, including a big basket in the final seconds, to lead Rhode Island past host Virginia Tech, 79-72, in the National Invitation Tournament.
